title: Belgians Outfox Mathieu van der Poel in Olympic Masterpiece: ‘When Remco Went, I Knew it Would Be Difficult’
content:
The Belgians set the trap, and Van der Poel walked right into it: 'Remco went at the perfect time. That's racing.'

Read the full article at Belgians Outfox Mathieu van der Poel in Olympic Masterpiece: ‘When Remco Went, I Knew it Would Be Difficult’ on Velo.
author: ahood
